titleStmt.title: Whether the Parliament be not in law dissolved by the death of the Princess of Orange? and how the subjects ought, and are to behave themselves in relation to those papers emitted since by the stile and title of Acts : with a brief account of the government of England : in a letter to a country gentleman, as an answer to his second question.
titleStmt.author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.

titleStmt.title: Whether the Parliament be not in law dissolved by the death of the Princess of Orange? and how the subjects ought, and are to behave themselves in relation to those papers emitted since by the stile and title of Acts : with a brief account of the government of England : in a letter to a country gentleman, as an answer to his second question.
titleStmt.author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Ferguson. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
